azureResourceGraph.query:
resources
| where tolower(subscriptionId) == tolower("$sub") and tolower(resourceGroup) == tolower("$rg") and tolower(name) == tolower($resfrontdoor)
| project Name=name, sku.name, location, subscriptionId
| join kind=inner(
    resourcecontainers
        | where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions" and tolower(subscriptionId) == tolower("$sub")
        | project subscriptionId, Subscription = name
) on subscriptionId
| project-away subscriptionId, subscriptionId1
| join kind=leftouter(
    alertsmanagementresources
        | where tolower(properties.context.context.resourceName) == tolower($resfrontdoor)
        | summarize count() by tostring(properties.context.context.resourceName), subscriptionId
        | project properties_context_context_resourceName, count_, subscriptionId
) on $left.Name == $right.properties_context_context_resourceName
| project Name, Alerts=iff(isnull(count_), 0, count_), SKU=tostring(sku_name), Subscription, Location=location
